# Format: "<serviceName> ';' [<waitFor> ',' ...] ';' [<dependency> ',' ...]"
speaker ; /services/speaker ;
keyboard; /dev/keyboard;
video; /dev/video;
kmmanager; /dev/kmmanager; keyboard
vesatext; /dev/vesatext;
vterm; /dev/vterm0,/dev/vterm1,/dev/vterm2,/dev/vterm3,/dev/vterm4,/dev/vterm5; kmmanager,speaker,vesatext,video,cmos
env; /services/env;
cmos; ;
zero; /dev/zero;
random; /dev/random;
null; /dev/null;
powermng; /services/powermng;
pci; ;
